body.name: Blood Pressure Watch, Smart Watch, Reloj Inteligente Para Hombre, 2.01" HD Waterproof Dial/Answer Fitness Tracker with Heart Rate Oxygen Pressure Monitor Smartwatch for Android Phones iPhone, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 9 mins
features: 【Blood Pressure Watch with Health Metrics Tracking】The blood pressure watch is equipped with features for monitoring blood pressure, heart rate, blood oxygen levels, sleep, and stress. You can conveniently check these real-time health metrics on your wrist anytime, anywhere, and view the full-day data records in the app of our smart watch.

【2.01-inch HD Color Touchscreen】The blood pressure watch features a curved design with a 2.01-inch HD color display and a fully touch-sensitive screen. Blood pressure watch ensures a better visual and operational experience, making it easier to see and navigate. The smart watch is both intuitive and aesthetically pleasing to use.

【Voice Assistant】By connecting the blood pressure watch to your phone, you can use the smart watch to call upon the voice assistant for quick inquiries about weather and more, making your experience faster and more convenient.Reloj Inteligente Para Hombre.

【Call/Make Call & Message Notifications】Stay connected with your family and friends while on the go by receiving immediate call and message notifications on your smart watch. The blood pressure watch allows you to view caller names, reject calls, mute the ringer, and read entire text messages. You won't miss any important calls or messages, and can even stay updated with social media notifications.

【Extended Battery Life and IP67 Waterproof】Charging the blood pressure watch is as simple as using the magnetic USB cable. It takes only 1.5 hours for a full charge, our smart watch supports 10 days of daily usage and has a standby time of up to 30 days. The blood pressure watch is also IP67 waterproof, allowing you to safely wash the strap, shower, exercise in the rain, and swim for short durations.

【Lifetime Warranty】We’re always on your team. Every percussive smart watch bearing our name undergoes rigorous scrutiny to make sure it delivers efficacy, and our built-in lifetime warranty ensures LIVE support from our ‘guiding angels.’

【Sports Modes and Activity Tracking】With over 200 sports modes, the smart watch activity tracker and blood pressure watch cover almost every daily physical activity you can imagine. Blood pressure watch provides you with new training methods and advanced metrics to gather more insights about your workout performance. The all-day activity tracking feature monitors your steps, distance, and calories burned throughout the day.

【Customizable Watch Faces】Upon connecting the device and Bluetooth through the DaFit app, you have multiple watch face options to choose from our smart watch. You can even customize the blood pressure watch face with photos from your own album, making it easy to match your attire and personal style.Reloj Inteligente Para Hombre.

【Wide Compatibility】The blood pressure watch is compatible with Android and iOS smartphones. It features a comfortable, durable, interchangeable, and washable strap with a secure buckle that can be adjusted to fit your wrist, providing a comfortable and snug fit for both women and men. Its slim and fashionable design makes it a perfect accessory for any outfit, seamlessly blending into your everyday life whether you're going to the gym or the office.

【Perfect Gift Choice for Festivals】With its comfortable and soft strap, rich and practical functionalities, the blood pressure watch makes for a perfect smart watch gift for holidays such as Christmas, birthdays, Mother's Day, Father's Day, and wedding anniversaries.Reloj Inteligente Para Hombre.
